resp = client.search(
    query={
        "more_like_this": {
            "fields": [
                "name.first",
                "name.last"
            ],
            "like": [
                {
                    "_index": "marvel",
                    "doc": {
                        "name": {
                            "first": "Ben",
                            "last": "Grimm"
                        },
                        "_doc": "You got no idea what I'd... what I'd give to be invisible."
                    }
                },
                {
                    "_index": "marvel",
                    "_id": "2"
                }
            ],
            "min_term_freq": 1,
            "max_query_terms": 12
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
